title: Border’s Closed, Buffet’s Open 3.13.20
itunes:title: Border’s Closed, Buffet’s Open 3.13.20
description:
In episode 586, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Sara June to discuss coronavirus updates, who is backing Joe Biden, sport leagues suspending their seasons, Golden Corral Buffet staying open, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Tom Hanks Got Sick in Australia, Where Coronavirus Testing Is a Snap
  2. Brazilian president's press secretary tests positive for coronavirus, days after meeting Trump
  3. Trump has 'no plans' for coronavirus test despite contact with infected Bolsonaro aide – live
  4. Trump claims (falsely) all Americans returning to country are being tested:"We have heavily tested. If an American coming back or anybody coming back, we have a tremendous testing set up where people coming in have to be tested ... if it shows positive ... We have to quarantine."
  5. McCarthy says Republicans won't support Democrats' coronavirus bill
  6. House Democrats’ virus bill: Free testing, paid sick leave
  7. JOE BIDEN’S CHIEF STRATEGIST LOBBIED TO UNDERMINE BARACK AND MICHELLE OBAMA’S SIGNATURE INITIATIVES
  8. Coronavirus live updates: NHL suspends season; MLB to halt spring training; NCAA conference tourneys canceled
  9. NBA suspends season until further notice after player tests positive for the coronavirus
  10. BUFFET RESTAURANT CHAINS NOT PUTTING A FORK IN IT FOR COVID-19 ... Chill, We'll Keep It Clean!!!
  11. Covid-19 Can't Stop People From Looking for Love (or Hookups)
  12. WATCH: Thool - Tepeu

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
